original_text: Thou shalt break them with a rod of iron; thou shalt dash them in pieces like a potter's vessel.
korean_text: 네가 철장으로 그들을 깨뜨림이여 질그릇 같이 부수리라 하시도다

sentences.original_text: Thou shalt break them with a rod of iron
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그들을 쇠 지팡이로 부수실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: thou shalt dash them in pieces
